products.title: Aria Vanilla 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their aria range comes in many different colours and has a perfect pattern which gives it more a sophisticated look to any room they are fitted in. This cream vertical blind is the perfect neutral for any room in your home and adds a touch of style with its understated pattern. Product id: sdb-vtb0925 fabric colour: vanilla material: 100% polyester headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes aria vanilla 89mm vertical blind in cream.

products.title: Aria Vanilla Vertical Blind
products.description: Intertwining wavy line design created by a two tone effect from matt and sheen threads. Aria vanilla vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Aria Vanilla
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 500mm max drop: 3500mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
